name: CrisWasn'tAlone
description:
Cris Wasn't Alone.

Come and enjoy this fantastic game, where you are not alone, are you? 

A game inspired in Thomas Was Alone game, with new puzzles, mechanics, build your own strategies to get to the goal and pass every level. 

Hope you enjoy it!

Cristian Casallas Developer. 

PS: if you have any issue with the menu selector when you select a level, just press ESC again.
